thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Asian Shares Sharply Lower After Wall Street Losses

author: Kevin Kingsbury
title: Asian Shares Sharply Lower After Wall Street Losses
text:
President Donald Trump’s pledge to impose stiff tariffs on steel and aluminum imports rippled across global markets Friday, extending U.S. stocks’ worst week of declines since early February.
Investors fled shares of companies that use steel to manufacture products and sought market havens across the world as the president’s pledge was met with threats of retaliation across Asia, Europe and North America. Shares of higher-growth companies such as biotechnology firms and other tech names, helped offset some of those losses.
...
